description:
Slam into the action with the Collection, featuring some of the finest modern-day digital pinball creations available from the pinball masters at Zen Studios. Four exciting themes await in the table pack that set the standard for pinball design, and continues to be one of the most beloved pinball collections of all time.

Tables In This Pack

Pasha
Explore a fantastical world of ancient Persian legends, where adventure awaits beyond every sand dune.

Rome
Defend the Empire, protect the land from peril and lead your legions to victory!

Biolab
Caution - Biohazard! Save creatures and unravel the missing cookie mystery!

Secrets of the Deep
Beneath the waves lies a world filled with exotic creatures and rare artifacts!
name: Pinball FX3 - Core Collection
